title: Sweet Fascination
description: The den, his quiet bachelor pad, became an appealing hive without changing a thing.Sage Harrison was desperate for the unthinkable. A room to accommodate three. She had to leave Johannesburg and find somewhere safe. The Drakensberg would be the ideal destination.Norman Jefferson who owned a ranch had the perfect hidey-hole, and the perfect room to accommodate three.Granting her wish, Norman had his first tenant. What would have been his den, became their hive. His fascination with Sage grew daily as he got to know the real meaning of being included.
author: Bridgitte Lesley
